creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Charles S. Pillsbury
inscription:
Signature, marks inscription

Lettered in plate, at upper left: 31 Ao(ut) AB 1886
markings: black stamp, at lower right [YB], Lugt 421 (Beurdeley)
provenance: Emmanuel Alfred (Alfred II) Beurdeley (1847-1919), Lugt 421, Paris (until ?1920 or 1921, his sale, July 2-3, 1920 or June 21-22, 1921, Delteil, Paris). Mrs. Charles Stinson Pillsbury (née Nelle Pendleton Winston), Minneapolis (until d. 1957; bequeathed to Mia)
signed: Signed and dated in plate:  31 Ao[ut] AB 1886
title: Robert Besnard (1881-1914) in Profile
